trans-unit.source: Contains information about the current installation.
trans-unit.target: 包含关于当前安装的信息。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> is created by an installation executable, such as InstallUtil.exe, that installs assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>创建由的安装可执行文件，如 InstallUtil.exe，安装程序集。

trans-unit.source: The installation program invokes the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> constructor, passing it the default log-file path and command-line parameters.
trans-unit.target: 安装程序时，将调用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>构造函数，将其传递默认日志文件路径和命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: Prior to calling its <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods, the installation program sets the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> property of an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> to the instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>.
trans-unit.target: 之前调用其<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>，或<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>方法，该安装程序会设置<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A>属性<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>到的实例<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>。

trans-unit.source: Before calling these methods, an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> that contains an installer collection in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property sets the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> property of each contained installer.
trans-unit.target: 在调用这些方法之前<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>包含中的安装程序集合<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>属性集<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A>的每个包含的安装程序的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A> property contains a parsed version of the command line that is entered to run the installation executable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A>属性包含已分析的版本的命令行输入运行可执行安装。

trans-unit.source: The property contains information such as the path to a log file, whether to display log information on the console, and whether to show a user interface during the installation.
trans-unit.target: 属性包含信息，例如日志文件、 是否将日志信息显示在控制台上，以及是否在安装过程中显示用户界面的路径。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.IsParameterTrue%2A> method to find out whether a command-line parameter is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.IsParameterTrue%2A>方法，以找出是否命令行参数为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A> method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A>方法将状态消息写入到安装日志文件和控制台。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.%23ctor%2A> constructors, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A> property and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.IsParameterTrue%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A>属性和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.IsParameterTrue%2A>方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>类。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> method of the installer is called, it checks for parameters from the command line.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>调用安装程序的方法时，它会检查从命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: Depending on that, it displays the progress messages onto the console and also saves it to the specified log file.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于，它将显示在控制台上的进度消息，并还将其保存到指定的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: When the program is invoked without any arguments, an empty <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> is created.
trans-unit.target: 当程序调用不带任何参数，一个空<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>创建。

trans-unit.source: When "/LogFile" and "/LogtoConsole" are specified, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> is created by passing the respective arguments to <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当"/ 日志文件"和"/ LogtoConsole"指定，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>通过将传递到各自的自变量创建<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.%23ctor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This overload does not create a log file for the installation.
trans-unit.target: 此重载不创建安装日志文件。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用的重载版本之一<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics.
trans-unit.target: 有关可能会提供其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。

trans-unit.source: When the program is invoked without any arguments, an empty <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> is created.
trans-unit.target: 当程序调用不带任何参数，一个空<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>创建。

trans-unit.source: The path to the log file for this installation, or <see langword="null" /> if no log file should be created.
trans-unit.target: 此安装的日志文件的路径，或者如果无须创建日志文件，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The command-line parameters entered when running the installation program, or <see langword="null" /> if none were entered.
trans-unit.target: 运行安装程序时输入的命令行参数，或者如果未输入任何内容，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext" /> class, and creates a log file for the installation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext" /> 类的新实例，并创建安装的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: If the installation uses [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md), this constructor creates a log file at the specified path and parses the array of command-line parameters into the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装使用[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)，此构造函数在指定的路径创建一个日志文件，并分析到命令行参数的数组<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If a log-file path is specified in the command-line parameters, it is used to create the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果在命令行参数中指定的日志文件路径，则它用于创建文件。

trans-unit.source: If the log file argument is not specified in the command line, the value of the `logFilePath` parameter is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果在命令行中的值未指定日志文件参数`logFilePath`使用参数。

trans-unit.source: To suppress the creation of a log file, pass the "/logfile= " command-line parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁止显示日志文件的创建，请将传递"/ 日志文件 ="命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自类概述中的示例<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>类。

trans-unit.source: When "/LogFile" and "/LogtoConsole" are specified, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> is created by passing the respective arguments to <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当"/ 日志文件"和"/ LogtoConsole"指定，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>通过将传递到各自的自变量创建<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.%23ctor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Pass your default log-file path in the <paramref name="logFilePath" /> parameter when you call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 将在你默认日志文件路径传递<paramref name="logFilePath" />参数时调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This is the where the log file is created, unless the /logfile command-line parameter is used when the installation executable is run.
trans-unit.target: 这就是创建日志文件，除非运行安装可执行文件时使用 /logfile 命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: The name of the command-line parameter to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的命令行参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified command-line parameter is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的命令行参数是否为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified parameter is set to "yes", "true", "1", or an empty string (""); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的参数设置为“是”、“真”、“1”或空字符串 ("")，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method accesses the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A> property, which contains a parsed version of the command-line parameters, to determine whether the specified parameter is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法访问<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A>属性，其中包含要确定是否存在指定的参数的命令行参数的已分析的版本`true`。

trans-unit.source: This example is an excerpt of the sample in the class overview of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自类概述中的示例<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>类。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.IsParameterTrue%2A> method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set.
trans-unit.target: 它使用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.IsParameterTrue%2A>方法若要查明`LogtoConsole`参数已设置。

trans-unit.source: If `yes`, it will then use the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A> method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果`yes`，然后将使用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A>方法将状态消息写入到安装日志文件和控制台。

trans-unit.source: The message to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的消息。

trans-unit.source: Writes a message to the console and to the log file for the installation.
trans-unit.target: 将消息写入控制台和安装的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: An installer can call this method to write progress or other status information to the log file.
trans-unit.target: 安装程序可以调用此方法以写入日志文件的进度或其他状态信息。

trans-unit.source: If the command-line parameters specify that a user interface should be displayed, the installer should show message boxes or make queries in addition to calling the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令行参数指定应显示用户界面，安装程序应显示消息框或使查询调用除了<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Text written to the log file will not be seen by the user unless InstallUtil.exe is used to run the installation and "/LogToConsole= true" is specified in the command line.
trans-unit.target: 写入日志文件的文本将不会被发现用户除非 InstallUtil.exe 用于运行安装和"/ LogToConsole = true"命令行中指定。

trans-unit.source: This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自类概述中的示例<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>类。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.IsParameterTrue%2A> method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set.
trans-unit.target: 它使用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.IsParameterTrue%2A>方法若要查明`LogtoConsole`参数已设置。

trans-unit.source: If `yes`, it will then use the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A> method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果`yes`，然后将使用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A>方法将状态消息写入到安装日志文件和控制台。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command-line parameters that were entered when InstallUtil.exe was run.
trans-unit.target: 获取在运行 InstallUtil.exe 时输入的命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary" /> that represents the command-line parameters that were entered when the installation executable was run.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary" />，它代表运行可执行安装文件时输入的命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> is created, the command-line parameters are parsed into the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当新<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>创建后，命令行参数解析为<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Both the keys and the values of the parameters are strings.
trans-unit.target: 密钥和参数的值是字符串。

trans-unit.source: This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自类概述中的示例<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext>类。

trans-unit.source: The sample retrieves the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A> property to see if any command line argument has been entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 该示例检索<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.Parameters%2A>属性以查看用户是否输入的任何命令行自变量。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.IsParameterTrue%2A> method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set.
trans-unit.target: 它还使用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.IsParameterTrue%2A>方法若要查明`LogtoConsole`参数已设置。

trans-unit.source: If `yes`, it will then use the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A> method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果`yes`，然后将使用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext.LogMessage%2A>方法将状态消息写入到安装日志文件和控制台。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the command-line parameters.
trans-unit.target: 包含命令行参数的数组。

trans-unit.source: Parses the command-line parameters into a string dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 将命令行参数分析到字符串字典中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary" /> containing the parsed command-line parameters.
trans-unit.target: 包含已分析的命令行参数的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary" />。
